machines.name: Vertical Band Saws
machines.description: vertical bladed saw used to make simple, smaller cuts

machines.name: Powermatic Vertical Band Saw
machines.description: larger scale band saw, used for small cuts in a medium project

machines.name: Horizontal Band Saw
machines.description: similar to a vertical band saw, however more force than a vertical band saw

machines.name: Chop/Miter Saw
machines.description: rotating circular blade used to make perpendicular and angled cuts on medium/large projects (good for projects that are longer in one direction, ex. PVC pipes)

machines.name: Drill Press
machines.description: used to drill holes through projects, can also use attachments to cut holes out of a piece (ex. for an inset); machines at varying speeds for different materials

machines.name: Grinder and Buffing Wheel
machines.description: used for sharpening and to give smoothness and polish metal surfaces

machines.name: Belt Sander
machines.description: used to sand down edges and corners on moderate-size projects

machines.name: Drum Sander
machines.description: used for fine surfacing or sanding wood

machines.name: Intermediate Sander
machines.description: used for smoothing edges on smaller projects

machines.name: Oscillating Spindle Sander
machines.description: used to smooth curved edges on pieces of wood

machines.name: Scroll Saw
machines.description: used to make intricate and precise cuts, usually small scale; can be adjusted to have a multidirectional blade that allows for smoother curves in a cut (think jigsaw puzzles)

machines.name: Table Saw
machines.description: used for large cuts

machines.name: Wooden Lathe
machines.description: rotates a piece of wood that can be carved with a chisel (think table legs), and can also be used to aid in uniform sanding of a project

machines.name: Powermatic Lathe
machines.description: a large scale lathe with the same use/function as the lathe mentioned above

machines.name: Planer/Jointer
machines.description: planer used to make a large flat sheet; jointer can be used to straighten and square edges

machines.name: CNC Router
machines.description: Computer Numerical Controlled milling machine that can remove material using a defined cutting edge to produce parts

machines.name: Lulzbots Mini
machines.description: Lulzbot Minis are single extruder printers with an area of 5 x 5 x5.5in

machines.name: Lulzbots Taz 6
machines.description: Lulzbot Taz 6 is a single extruder with a print area of 11 x 11 x 10in

machines.name: Stratasys Fortus 450MC
machines.description: a thermoplastic 3D printer with a print area of 16 x 14 x 16in; possesses multiple extruders and should be used for more in-depth projects that require precision

machines.name: 45W Full Spectrum P-Series Laser Cutter
machines.description: cutter can perform vector cuts as well as engrave into materials. If you need to use ABS or other toxic materials, you will need to get approval by an advisor prior to making any cuts due to health hazards.

machines.name: 90W Full Spectrum Laser H-Series Professional 24″x16″ CO2 Laser
machines.description: cutters can perform vector cuts as well as engrave into materials. If you need to use ABS or other toxic materials, you will need to get approval by an advisor prior to making any cuts due to health hazards.

machines.name: Cricut
machines.description: digital die-cutting machine that can cut many different materials like paper, vinyl, heat transfer vinyl, and cardstock

machines.name: Embroidery Machine
machines.description: can be used for sewing as well as embroidery

machines.name: CNC Mill (Haas)
machines.description: Computer Numerical Controlled milling machine that can remove material using a defined cutting edge to produce parts (can handle materials such as metal)

machines.name: CNC Lathe (Haas)
machines.description: Computer Numerical Controlled turning machine

machines.name: Bridgeport Mill
machines.description: can be used for automatic or manual milling

machines.name: Horizontal Metal Bandsaw
machines.description: used for making horizontal cuts through metal

machines.name: Arbor Press
machines.description: built for pressing, bending, and straightening sheet metal

machines.name: ProtoMAX WaterJet Cutter
machines.description: can cut through material such as: aluminum, titanium, stone, carbon fiber, and G10 composite

machines.name: Lincoln Arc Welder
machines.description: can weld a variety of materials such as carbon, low alloy, and stainless steel as well as cast iron
